PHRASE.LANG: It seems you enjoy the good things in life. Here's something to your tastes. [#Legal]
Vous avez l'air d'apprécier les bonnes choses. La suite devrait vous plaire. [#Legal]
Anscheinend genießt du die schönen Dinge des Lebens. Hier ist etwas, das dir gefallen wird. [#Legal]
Sembra che ti piacciano le cose belle della vita. Qui abbiamo qualcosa per i tuoi gusti. [#Legal]
Parece que te gusta disfrutar de las cosas buenas de la vida. ¡Esto te encantará! [#Legal]
It seems you enjoy the good things in life. Here's something to your tastes. [#Legal]
It seems you enjoy the good things in life. Here's something to your tastes. [#Legal]
